description:
You are given an array of integers. Your task is to find and print the numbers greater than the average of the numbers in the array.

#### `Input Format:`

- `The first line contains an integer `n`, representing the size of the array.`

- `The second line contains `n` space-separated integers, representing the elements of the array.`

#### `Output Format:`

`Print all numbers in the array that are greater than the average of the numbers in the array, each separated by a space.`

#### `Sample Input:`

```
5
10 15 8 20 5
```

#### `Sample Output:`

```
15 20
```

#### `Constraints:`

- `1 <= n <= 10^5`
- `-10^9 <= Elements of the array <= 10^9`
title: Greater Than Average
